name: RPG Pixel items asset pack
description:
Asset pack in development!

Asset pack divided into 2 versions:
- trial, contains all the necessary sprites to create a simple game.
- full, contains the full asset pack, on the basis of which you can create a full-fledged game with your idea.

Asset pack content (Without utility sprites)

YOU CAN:
- Edit and use the asset in any commercial or non commercial project;

YOU CAN'T:
- Resell or distribute the asset to others;

- If you need more sprites for your project, contact me and we will discuss it;
